title: Roadie
description: Trash app. Tells you that driving towards store for pick up gives you chance at getting gig but also states that if you’re at the store you’re not guaranteed to get it. Makes no sense to waste gas. Pays slave wages. Gives orders to drivers who steal them and are never on time for pick up yet I’m sitting there because didn’t get the gig given to some other unqualified driver. It’s funny. Gives times for pick up and drop off that make no sense especially when the store isn’t open yet
